code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import apiUrl from"../config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FileList=_ref=>{let{setSelectedFile}=_ref;const[files,setFiles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(`${apiUrl}/list-files`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setFiles(data)).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching files:",error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Available Companies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:files.map(file=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedFile(file),children:file})},file))})]});};export default FileList;
